Spotly

Spring 2017 | Web Design and Front-End Implementation | In- Development

Spotly is a web application that allows users to share and track their fitness progress. This project is currently in progress with 2 other developers. I hold the responsibility of designing the UI and visual appearance of the web-site as well as implementing the front-end. The front-end is currently being implemented with HTML, CSS/SASS, and JavaScript. Below are the initial mock-ups of the website.

The project can be found at Spotly.
